Property-Details.Property-Type: Schools And Seasonal Public Buildings; Swimming Pool Centre

AC-Sub-System.Sub-System-Description: Mr Blobby's Sports Academy has a number of air conditioned rooms served by 11 split A/C systems covered within the scope of this report. The total air conditioned floor space is 684 M2 with a total cooling capacity of 80 KW

Property-Details.Property-Type: Schools And Seasonal Public Buildings; Swimming Pool Centre

Air-Conditioning-Inspection-Report.Executive-Summary: Mr Blobby's Sports Academy has 11 split Air Conditioning systems that fall within the scope of this report, with a total cooling capacity of 74kw, treating a total floor space of 445m2. The size of the air conditioning systems in relation to their cooling loads was found to be correct. The standard of routine maintenance was found in good order.

ACI-Recommendation.Text: Consideration should be given to the replacement of the current air conditioning systems as they are of an old inefficient and outdated design. If these system were replaced with modern design inverter air conditioning systems, significant energy savings could be made.
Consideration should also be given to clear labeling next to the controllers with operational advice, this is particularly relevant as time clock control is not used.

All of the air conditioning systems inspected were found to be in a good serviceable condition, with routine maintenance carried out to a high standard. This should be continued with as this is pivotal to the energy efficient operation of the air conditioning systems.
There are separate forms of heating in a number of areas. Care should be taken to ensure that these separate systems do not conflict with each other.

The air conditioning systems are managed correctly, all of the air conditioning systems inspected were found to be in a good serviceable condition, with routine maintenance carried out to a high standard. This should be continued with as this is pivotal to the energy efficient operation of the air conditioning systems.

ACI-Sub-System.Sub-System-Description: Mr Blobby's Sports Academy has a number of air conditioned rooms served by 11 split A/C systems covered within the scope of this report. The total air conditioned floor space is 567 M2 with a total cooling capacity of 80 KW

ACI-Recommendation.Text: The system is sized correctly in accordance with CIBSE TM44 Guidelines.

F-Gas-Inspection.Note: The system is correctly documented in the F-Gas register.

Compressor-Control.Note: The compressors are direct on line operation, on/off control.

ACI-Recommendation.Text: This method of capacity control is of an old inefficient and outdated design. Energy savings could be made if this system was replaced with a new modern energy efficient inverter controlled system.

Competent-Person.Note: The maintenance is carried out by a correctly F-Gas registered company.

ACI-Recommendation.Text: Timer function not used as most areas are classrooms that have irregular occupied hours.

Sensors-Appropriate.Note: The sensors used are the manufactures on board type.

ACI-Recommendation.Text: Care should be taken in operating the air conditioning systems as there are separate heating systems within the same areas. These should never operate together.

Use-Guidance-Or-Controls.Note: Consideration should be given to the use of operational guidance notices.

ACI-Recommendation.Text: A dead band is set for cooling operation in the manufacturers control strategy.

Equipment-Capacity.Note: Care should be taken in operating the air conditioning systems as there are separate heating systems within the same areas. These should never operate together.

ACI-Recommendation.Text: Air flow control is via the remote controllers.
